name: KGB
summary: KGB is an Adventure game, developed by Cryo Interactive and published by Virgin Games, which was released in 1992.

name: KGZDoom1
summary: You find an old outpost, primitive brick and wood. They have found something evil, and are building a new complex to bring the evil to life.

name: KGoldrunner
summary: KGoldrunner is an action game where the hero runs through a maze, climbs stairs, dig holes and dodges enemies in order to collect all the gold nuggets and escape to the next level. Your enemies are also after the gold. Worse still, they are after you!.
